rules_text: Target player reveals their hand. For each card type among cards in it, that player discards a card of that type.
flavor_text: [i]The calm his presence brought. The way the magic wards would react. The suspicious stares from afar. Together, a truth Suvic could no longer deny; their minds were being affected. By [/i]him[i].[/i]
special_text2:
[+2]: Each player mills two cards. You gain life equal to the greatest mana value among them.
[-X]: Exile target card with mana value X from a graveyard. If you do, you draw X cards and you lose X life.
[-8]: Surveil 4. You may look at and play the top card of your library this turn, and you may spend life as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.
